cw:dialect.cw:title: ISO 19115 and ISO 19115-2 / ISO 19139 and ISO 19139-2
Open Geospatial Consortium Sensor Observation Service (SOS)
FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata (CSDGM)

cw:spiral.cw:title: Test Display
cw:spiral.cw:description: This spiral is used to test the display

cw:spiral.cw:title: Identification
cw:spiral.cw:description: The Identification Spiral sets the stage for discovery of the described resource using text search engines. It includes a unique identifier for the metadata, a title, an abstract, theme keywords and contact information for the metadata and the dataset. In many dialects citations to the described resource are used to provide important information about how users should cite the documented resource that is described by the metadata. These citations are an important part of the identification information and, as such, they are in a special location in the record.

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Title
cw:item.cw:description: A short description of the resource. The title should be descriptive enough so that when a user is presented with a list of titles the general content of the data set can be determined.

cw:item.cw:name: Alternate Resource Title
cw:item.cw:description: An alternative title for the resource.

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Creation/Revision Date
cw:item.cw:description: The date the resource was created

cw:item.cw:name: Abstract
cw:item.cw:description: A paragraph describing the resource.
cw:item.cw:note: This concept is called "Desciption" in Catalog Services for the Web.

cw:item.cw:name: Topic Category
cw:item.cw:description: High level category enumeration used in ISO

cw:item.cw:name: Theme Keyword
cw:item.cw:description: A word or phrase that describes some aspect of a resource. Can be one of several types.
cw:item.cw:note: The general identification keywords usually have a type of "theme" and are refered to as "theme keywords". Other types and vocabularies are used for other information. Service Entry Resource Format (SERF) requires a Science and a Service GCMD Keyword. This concept is called Subject in the CSW Specification.

cw:item.cw:name: Keyword Vocabulary
cw:item.cw:description: If you are following a guideline or using a shared vocabulary for the words/phrases in your "keywords" attribute, put the name of that guideline here.
cw:item.cw:path: if (/database/table_data[@name="gcmd_science_keyword"] !=false) then (Global Change Master Directory Keywords) else null
cw:item.cw:note: DIF, ECHO and ECS require that theme keywords come from the Global Change Master Directory list.

cw:item.cw:name: Metadata Contact
cw:item.cw:description: The organization or person currently responsible for the metadata.

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Contact
cw:item.cw:description: The organization or person responsible for answering questions about the resource.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Keyword
cw:spiral.cw:description: Keywords are used by many metadata dialects in order to enable discipline specific descriptions of various kinds and discovery using those descriptions. Keywords usually come from shared vocabularies in order to encourage consistency across metadata collections. Keywords can support text searches as well as facet searches.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Rubric Spatial and Temporal Search
cw:spiral.cw:description: This basic extent information supports spatial/temporal searches that are increasingly important as the number of map based search interfaces increases. Many of the attributes included in this spiral can be calculated from the data if the file is compliant with the NetCDF Climate and Forecast (CF) Metadata Convention. Describes a simple latitude, longitude, vertical and temporal bounding box. For a more detailed geospatial coverage, see the suggested geospatial attributes. Further refinement of the geospatial bounding box can be provided by using these units and resolution attributes. Many of these extent attributes are calculated using the CF-Conventions.

cw:spiral.cw:title: People
cw:spiral.cw:description: Connecting people to datasets is an important role of metadata. Some dialects include people/organizations that are specifically defined. Others include an attribute or element for specifying the role of individuals/organizations.

cw:item.cw:name: Role
cw:item.cw:description: function performed by the responsible party

cw:item.cw:name: Organization Name
cw:item.cw:description: Name of the organization

cw:item.cw:name: Responsible Party Identifier
cw:item.cw:description: A unique identifier for a person or an organization

cw:item.cw:name: Responsible Party Identifier Type
cw:item.cw:description: The type of a unique identifier for a person or an organization

cw:item.cw:name: Responsible Party Identifier Type URI
cw:item.cw:description: The type of a unique identifier for a person or an organization

cw:item.cw:name: Position Name
cw:item.cw:description: Name of the job or position in an organization

cw:item.cw:name: First Name
cw:item.cw:description: First name of the individual

cw:item.cw:name: Middle Name
cw:item.cw:description: Middle name of the individual

cw:item.cw:name: Last Name
cw:item.cw:description: Last name of the individual

cw:item.cw:name: Email
cw:item.cw:description: Email address of the individual or organization

cw:item.cw:name: Hours of Service
cw:item.cw:description: Time period (including time zone) when individuals can contact the organisation or individual

cw:item.cw:name: Contact Instructions
cw:item.cw:description: Supplemental instructions on how or when to contact the individual or organisation

cw:item.cw:name: Phone
cw:item.cw:description: Telephone numbers at which the organisation or individual may be contacted

cw:item.cw:name: Fax
cw:item.cw:description: Telephone numbers at which the organisation or individual may be contacted via facsimile (fax)

cw:item.cw:name: Address
cw:item.cw:description: Address line for the location

cw:item.cw:name: City
cw:item.cw:description: City of the location

cw:item.cw:name: Province or State
cw:item.cw:description: Province, state, or other administrative area of the location

cw:item.cw:name: Postal_Code
cw:item.cw:description: Zip code or other postal code for the location

cw:item.cw:name: Country
cw:item.cw:description: Country of the location

cw:item.cw:name: Web Page
cw:item.cw:description: On-line information that can be used to contact the individual or organisation

cw:spiral.cw:title: Citations
cw:spiral.cw:description: Citations in metadata provide can important information about how users should cite the documented resource. These citations are an important part of the identification information and, as such, they are in a special location in the record. In addition, some dialects include citation to other resources and relevant materials that can not be included in the metadata. General citations to external resources that can occur anywhere in the record are described here.

cw:item.cw:name: Cited Resource Title
cw:item.cw:description: A short description of the (cited) resource.

cw:item.cw:name: Cited Resource Alternate Title
cw:item.cw:description: Alternate title of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Cited Resource Identifier
cw:item.cw:description: Identifier for the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Author
cw:item.cw:description: Author of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Author / Originator World Wide Web Address
cw:item.cw:description: The World Wide Web mail address of the principal author of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Editor
cw:item.cw:description: Editor of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Series Title
cw:item.cw:description: Title of a series that includes the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Publication Date
cw:item.cw:description: Date of publication of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Revision Date
cw:item.cw:description: Date of revision of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Creation Date
cw:item.cw:description: Date of creation of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Publisher
cw:item.cw:description: Publisher of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Publisher Location
cw:item.cw:description: Place of publication of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Publisher URL
cw:item.cw:description: World Wide Web address associated with the publisher of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Publisher E-Mail
cw:item.cw:description: Email associated with the publisher of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Version
cw:item.cw:description: Version of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Version Date
cw:item.cw:description: Date of the version of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Volume
cw:item.cw:description: Volume of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Issue
cw:item.cw:description: Issue of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Pages
cw:item.cw:description: Pages of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: ISBN
cw:item.cw:description: International Standard Book Number (ISBN) of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: ISSN
cw:item.cw:description: International Standard Serial Number (ISSN) of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Report Number
cw:item.cw:description: Report number of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Other Citation Details
cw:item.cw:description: Other information about the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Presentation Form
cw:item.cw:description: Form of the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Online Resource
cw:item.cw:description: Online Resource for the cited resource

cw:item.cw:name: Complete Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Complete citation for the resource as a text blob.

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Citation for the resource.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Dataset / Granule / Metadata Identifiers
cw:spiral.cw:description: The importance of unique identifiers for data is well understood in terms of data citation and unambiguous attribution. As metadata are shared between National and International repositories it is becoming increasing important to be able to unambiguously identify and refer to specific records. This requirement is facilitated by including an identifier for metadata and data in the metadata. Some mechanism must exist for ensuring that these identifiers are unique. This is accomplished by specifying the naming authority or namespace for the identifier. It is the responsibility of the manager of the namespace to ensure that the identifiers in that namespace are unique.

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Identifier
cw:item.cw:description: Identifier for the resource described by the metadata

cw:item.cw:name: Related Resource Identifier
cw:item.cw:description: Identifier for a resource related to the resource being described.

cw:item.cw:name: Naming Authority
cw:item.cw:description: The organization responsible for the maintenance of the identifier (namespace)
cw:item.cw:note: DIF and ECHO use the Global Change Master Directory (GCMD) keywords. In DCAT this is a controlled vocabulary with only one value (DOI)

cw:item.cw:name: Parent Identifier
cw:item.cw:description: A unique identifier for a parent dataset or collection

cw:spiral.cw:title: EML Completeness-Identification
cw:spiral.cw:description: Minimum content for adequate data set discovery in a general cataloging system or repository (functionally equivalent to LTER DTOC)

cw:item.name: Author / Originator
cw:item.cw:path: /eml:eml/eml:dataset/eml:creator[eml:individualName[eml:givenName and /eml:surName]and[eml:address[eml:deliveryPoint and eml:city and eml:postalCode] and eml:phone and eml:electronicMailAddress and eml:onlineUrl]

cw:item.cw:name: Metadata Contact
cw:item.cw:path: /eml:eml/eml:dataset/eml:metadataProvider[eml:individualName[eml:givenName and /eml:surName]and[eml:address[eml:deliveryPoint and eml:city and eml:postalCode] and eml:phone and eml:electronicMailAddress and eml:onlineUrl]

cw:item.cw:name: Contributor Name
cw:item.cw:path: /eml:eml/eml:dataset/eml:associatedParty[eml:individualName[eml:givenName and /eml:surName]and[eml:address[eml:deliveryPoint and eml:city and eml:postalCode] and eml:phone and eml:electronicMailAddress and eml:onlineUrl]

cw:item.cw:name: Keyword Set
cw:item.cw:description: Should include the three letter site acronym, core research area(s), some meaningful geographic place names (e.g. state, city, county), network acronym (LTER, ILTER, etc.), organizational affiliation, funding source (i.e. cofunded with other sources, non-LTER funding etc.). Multiple sets of key words can be included. In addition to specific keywords, relevant conceptual keywords should also be included.

cw:item.cw:name: Distribution
cw:item.cw:description: This element most closely resembles the spiral about distribution info. The subelements describe how the dataset is available, online, offline, inline.
cw:item.cw:path: /eml:eml/eml:dataset/eml:distribution[eml:online or eml:offline or eml:inline or (eml:online and eml:offline) or (eml:online and eml:inline) or (eml:offline and eml:inline) or (eml:online and eml:offline and eml:inline)]

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Contact
cw:item.cw:path: /eml:eml/eml:dataset/eml:contact[eml:individualName[eml:givenName and /eml:surName]and[eml:address[eml:deliveryPoint and eml:city and eml:postalCode] and eml:phone and eml:electronicMailAddress and eml:onlineUrl]

cw:item.cw:name: Publisher
cw:item.cw:path: /eml:eml/eml:dataset/eml:publisher[eml:individualName[eml:givenName and /eml:surName]and[eml:address[eml:deliveryPoint and eml:city and eml:postalCode] and eml:phone and eml:electronicMailAddress and eml:onlineUrl]

cw:spiral.cw:title: EML Completeness-Discovery
cw:spiral.cw:description: Level 1 content, plus coverage information to support targeted searches, adding elements

cw:item.cw:name: Taxonomic Extent
cw:item.cw:description: The extent of the taxonomies coverage.

cw:item.name: Maintenance
cw:item.cw:description: should be used to document changes to the data tables or metadata, including update frequency (see Example 2.2). The change history can also be used to describe alterations in static documents.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Description Information
cw:spiral.cw:description: The Description Spiral provides additional information that may be searched in some text searches. It includes brief textural descriptions of items that are also described quantitatively in other spirals.

cw:item.cw:name: Purpose
cw:item.cw:description: A paragraph describing the original purpose for collecting the dataset.

cw:item.cw:name: Standard Name Vocabulary
cw:item.cw:description: The name of the shared vocabulary from which variable standard names are taken.

cw:item.cw:name: Lineage Statement
cw:item.cw:description: Information and references for sources and processes that were used to create the dataset and an audit trail for modifications to the original data.

cw:item.cw:name: Supplemental Information
cw:item.cw:description: Miscellaneous information about the data.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Spatial and Temporal Search
cw:spiral.cw:description: This basic extent information supports spatial/temporal searches that are increasingly important as the number of map based search interfaces increases. Many of the attributes included in this spiral can be calculated from the data if the file is compliant with the NetCDF Climate and Forecast (CF) Metadata Convention. Describes a simple latitude, longitude, vertical and temporal bounding box. For a more detailed geospatial coverage, see the suggested geospatial attributes. Further refinement of the geospatial bounding box can be provided by using these units and resolution attributes. Many of these extent attributes are calculated using the CF-Conventions.

cw:item.cw:name: Site
cw:item.cw:description: The name or description of the physical location where the data were collected

cw:item.cw:name: Site Location
cw:item.cw:description: The latitude/longitude/elevation of the physical location where the data were collected

cw:item.cw:name: Southernmost Latitude
cw:item.cw:description: The southernmost latitude of the bounding rectangle.
cw:item.cw:note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.

cw:item.cw:name: Northernmost Latitude
cw:item.cw:description: The northernmost latitude of the bounding rectangle.
cw:item.cw:note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute (e.g. gml:id="network-all") can be used to identify the bounding offering.

cw:item.cw:name: Latitude Dimension Length
cw:item.cw:description: The number of divisions on the latitude axis

cw:item.cw:name: Latitude Resolution
cw:item.cw:description: The average distance between divisions on the latitude axis

cw:item.cw:name: Westernmost Longitude
cw:item.cw:description: The westernmost longitude of the bounding rectangle.
cw:item.cw:note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.

cw:item.cw:name: Easternmost Longitude
cw:item.cw:description: The easternmost longitude of the bounding rectangle.
cw:item.cw:note: OGC-SOS offering lists may not include the entire dataset. A gml:id attribute can be used to identify the bounding offering.

cw:item.cw:name: Longitude Dimension Length
cw:item.cw:description: The number of divisions on the longitude axis

cw:item.cw:name: Longitude Resolution
cw:item.cw:description: The average distance between divisions on the longitude axis

cw:item.cw:name: Start Time
cw:item.cw:description: The start of the bounding time period

cw:item.cw:name: End Time
cw:item.cw:description: The end of the bounding time period

cw:item.cw:name: Vertical Minimum
cw:item.cw:description: The minimum height of the bounding rectangle

cw:item.cw:name: Vertical Maximum
cw:item.cw:description: The maximum height of the bounding rectangle

cw:item.cw:name: Vertical Dimension Length
cw:item.cw:description: The number of divisions on the vertical axis

cw:item.cw:name: Vertical Resolution
cw:item.cw:description: The average distance between divisions on the vertical axis

cw:item.cw:name: Place Keyword
cw:item.cw:description: A comma separated list of key words and phrases that give the location of the resource.
cw:item.cw:note: Some dialects include keywords, but they do not include mechanisms for identifying the type. In those cases it is difficult to unambiguously identify place keywords.

cw:item.cw:name: Place Keyword Vocabulary
cw:item.cw:description: If you are following a guideline for the place words/phrases in your "keywords" attribute, put the name of that guideline here.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Creator Search
cw:spiral.cw:description: This group includes attributes that could support searches for people/institutions/projects that are responsible for datasets. This information is also critical for the correct attribution of the people and institutions that produce datasets.

cw:item.cw:name: Author / Originator
cw:item.cw:description: The principal author of the resource
cw:item.cw:note: In CSW this concept is called Creator

cw:item.cw:name: Originating Organization
cw:item.cw:description: The organization responsible for creating the resource

cw:item.cw:name: Author / Originator Email Address
cw:item.cw:description: The electronic mail address of the principal author of the resource

cw:item.cw:name: Author / Originator Responsible Party Identifier
cw:item.cw:description: A unique identifier for a resource author or originator

cw:item.cw:name: Author / Originator Responsible Party Identifier Type
cw:item.cw:description: The type of unique identifier for a resource author or originator

cw:item.name: Author / Originator World Wide Web Address

cw:item.cw:name: Issue Date
cw:item.cw:description: The date the resource was issued

cw:spiral.cw:title: Online Resources
cw:spiral.cw:description: All of these approaches to describing online resources include properties that make links more self-explanatory and easier to use.

cw:item.cw:name: URL
cw:item.cw:description: Address of the online resource

cw:item.cw:name: Online Resource Name/Title
cw:item.cw:description: A name or title of the online resource

cw:item.cw:name: Online Resource Description
cw:item.cw:description: A brief description of the online resource

cw:item.cw:name: Online Resource Function
cw:item.cw:description: A description of the function of the online resource

cw:item.cw:name: Format of the Online Resource
cw:item.cw:description: Identify the format of the online resource

cw:spiral.cw:title: Catalog Services for the Web (CSW) Core Queryables
cw:spiral.cw:description: The Open Geospatial Consortium Catalog Services for the Web (CSW) standard defines 11 Core Queryables that must be supported in any compliant implementation. Profiles of CSW map these queryables to concepts and xPaths for particular metadata dialects. For additional reference information see the ISO Profile of CSW (Table 6).

cw:item.cw:name: Metadata Identifier
cw:item.cw:description: A phrase or string which uniquely identifies the metadata file/record.

cw:item.cw:name: Modified Date
cw:item.cw:description: Date on which the record was created or updated within the catalogue

cw:item.cw:name: Bounding Box
cw:item.cw:description: A bounding box for identifying a geographic area of interest
cw:item.cw:note: This concept is called "Coverage" in the CSW Specification

cw:item.cw:name: Coordinate Reference System (CRS)
cw:item.cw:description: Geographic Coordinate Reference System (Authority and ID) for the BoundingBox

cw:item.cw:name: Association
cw:item.cw:description: Complete statement of a one-to-one relationship

cw:spiral.cw:title: Catalog Services for the Web (CSW) Core Returnable Properties
cw:spiral.cw:description: The Open Geospatial Consortium Catalog Services for the Web (CSW) standard defines 15 Core Returnables that must be supported in any compliant implementation. Profiles of CSW map these queryables to concepts and xPaths for particular metadata dialects. For additional reference information see the ISO Profile of CSW (Table 9).

cw:item.cw:name: Contributor Name
cw:item.cw:description: Contributor to the resource

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Format
cw:item.cw:description: The physical or digital manifestation of the resource

cw:item.cw:name: Metadata Language
cw:item.cw:description: Language of the metadata

cw:item.cw:name: Rights
cw:item.cw:description: Information about rights held in and over the resource

cw:spiral.cw:title: Catalog Service for the Web (CSW) Additional Queryable Properties
cw:spiral.cw:description: The Open Geospatial Consortium Catalog Services for the Web (CSW) standard supports 10 Additional Queryable search parameters. Profiles of CSW map these queryables to concepts and xPaths for particular metadata dialects. For additional reference information see the ISO Profile of CSW (Table 10).

cw:item.cw:name: Security Constraints
cw:item.cw:description: Handling restrictions imposed on the resource or metadata for national security or similar security concerns.

cw:item.cw:name: Keyword Type
cw:item.cw:description: Methods used to group similar keywords

cw:spiral.cw:title: Resource and Metadata Constraints
cw:spiral.cw:description: Constraints on the use of the resource and metadata

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Access Constraints
cw:item.cw:description: Information about any constraints for accessing the data set. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, limitations and/or warnings on obtaining the data set. Some words that may be used in this field include: Public, In-house, Limited, Additional detailed instructions on how to access the data can be entered in this field.

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Use Constraints
cw:item.cw:description: Information about how the data may or may not be used after access is granted to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, terms and conditions, and/or limitations on using the data set. Data providers may request acknowledgement of the data from users and claim no responsibility for quality and completeness of data.

cw:item.cw:name: Metadata Access Constraints
cw:item.cw:description: Information about any constraints for accessing the data set. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, limitations and/or warnings on obtaining the data set. Some words that may be used in this field include: Public, In-house, Limited, Additional detailed instructions on how to access the data can be entered in this field.

cw:item.cw:name: Metadata Use Constraints
cw:item.cw:description: Information about how the data may or may not be used after access is granted to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, terms and conditions, and/or limitations on using the data set. Data providers may request acknowledgement of the data from users and claim no responsibility for quality and completeness of data.

cw:item.cw:name: Release Constraints
cw:item.cw:description: Information about resource release constraints.

cw:item.cw:name: Release Constraints
cw:item.cw:description: Information about resource release constraints.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Distribution Information
cw:spiral.cw:description: Information about the distribution of the resource

cw:item.cw:name: Media
cw:item.cw:description: Media on which the resource is available

cw:item.cw:name: Ordering Instructions
cw:item.cw:description: General instructions, terms and services provided by the distributor

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Cost or Fees
cw:item.cw:description: Cost associated with access to the resource

cw:item.cw:name: Distribution Format
cw:item.cw:description: Description of the data format available for distribution.

cw:item.cw:name: Transfer Size
cw:item.cw:description: The size of the digital resource

cw:item.cw:name: Distribution Contact
cw:item.cw:description: Contact information for the organization or individual that distributes the resource.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Service
cw:spiral.cw:description: Services provide data in standard responses and formats.

cw:item.cw:name: Service Type
cw:item.cw:description: Standard name for a service type.

cw:item.cw:name: Service Type Version
cw:item.cw:description: Standard name for a version of a service.

cw:item.cw:name: Service Provider
cw:item.cw:description: Organization or person responsible for the service.

cw:item.cw:name: Service Operation Name
cw:item.cw:description: Name of an operation provided by the service.

cw:item.cw:name: Service Location
cw:item.cw:description: Endpoint for accessing the service.

cw:item.cw:name: Service Parameters
cw:item.cw:description: A narrative explanation of the role of the parameter.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Content
cw:spiral.cw:description: Describing the content of a resource is critical for supporting parameter searches and for unambiguously identifying resources that include identical parameters.

cw:item.cw:name: Coverage Content Type
cw:item.cw:description: An item from a shared vocabulary of content types: image, thematicClassification, physicalMeasurement, auxiliaryInformation, qualityInformation, referenceInformation, modelResult

cw:item.cw:name: Parameter Name
cw:item.cw:description: The name of a parameter included in the resource. Intended to be used by applications accessing a variable in a file.

cw:item.cw:name: Parameter Name (Long)
cw:item.cw:description: The long name of a parameter included in the resource. Intended to be used as an axis lable in a plot.

cw:item.cw:name: Parameter Name (Standard)
cw:item.cw:description: The name of a parameter included in the resource from a standard vocabulary.

cw:item.cw:name: Parameter Definition
cw:item.cw:description: The definition/description of a parameter included in the resource.

cw:item.cw:name: Parameter Units
cw:item.cw:description: The units of a parameter included in the resource.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Lineage
cw:spiral.cw:description: Understanding how sources that are combined or processed to create a new dataset and how those sources are processed is critical to effective use of the resource.

cw:item.cw:name: Source
cw:item.cw:description: Dataset used in or produced by a processStep

cw:item.cw:name: Process Step
cw:item.cw:description: A step in the processing that produced a resource

cw:spiral.cw:title: Entities and Attributes
cw:spiral.cw:description: Describing the entities in a resource and the attributes that describe them is an important role for metadata.

cw:item.cw:name: Overview
cw:item.cw:description: Detailed summary of the information contained in a data set.

cw:item.cw:name: Overview Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Reference to the complete description of the entity types, attributes, and attribute values for the data set.

cw:item.cw:name: Entity Type Label
cw:item.cw:description: The name of the entity type.

cw:item.cw:name: Entity Type Definition
cw:item.cw:description: The description of the entity type

cw:item.cw:name: Entity Type Definition Source
cw:item.cw:description: The source of the description of the entity type

cw:item.cw:name: Attribute Label
cw:item.cw:description: The name of the attribute.

cw:item.cw:name: Attribute Definition
cw:item.cw:description: The description of the attribute

cw:item.cw:name: Attribute Definition Source
cw:item.cw:description: The source of the description of the entity type

cw:item.cw:name: Enumerated Domain Value
cw:item.cw:description: The name or label of a member of the set.

cw:item.cw:name: Enumerated Domain Value Definition
cw:item.cw:description: The definition of a member of the set.

cw:item.cw:name: Enumerated Domain Value Definition Source
cw:item.cw:description: The source of a definition of a member of the set.

cw:item.cw:name: Range Domain Minimum Value
cw:item.cw:description: The least value that the attribute can be assigned.

cw:item.cw:name: Range Domain Maximum Value
cw:item.cw:description: The greatest value that the attribute can be assigned.

cw:item.cw:name: Range Domain Units
cw:item.cw:description: The unit of measurement for an attribute value.

cw:item.cw:name: Range Domain Attribute Resolution
cw:item.cw:description: The smallest unit increment to which an attribute value is measured.

cw:item.cw:name: Codeset Domain Codeset Name
cw:item.cw:description: The title of the codeset.

cw:item.cw:name: Codeset Domain Codeset Source
cw:item.cw:description: the authority for the codeset.

cw:item.cw:name: Unrepresentable Domain
cw:item.cw:description: Description of the values and reasons why they cannot be represented.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Browse Graphics
cw:spiral.cw:description: Browse graphics and other multimedia samples are important aids to data discovery and assessment.

cw:item.cw:name: Browse File Name
cw:item.cw:description: Name of the file holding the browse graphic.

cw:item.cw:name: Browse URL
cw:item.cw:description: Location of the browse file on the Web.

cw:item.cw:name: Format
cw:item.cw:description: Format of the multimedia sample or browse image.

cw:item.cw:name: Caption
cw:item.cw:description: Brief description of the multimedia sample or browse image.

cw:item.cw:name: Description
cw:item.cw:description: Complete description of the multimedia sample or browse image.

cw:spiral.cw:title: ISO-1 for Data Discovery - Mandatory
cw:spiral.cw:description: This spiral includes mandatory ISO 19115-1 attributes for data discovery. This list of attributes was obtained from table F.1 of the ISO 19115-1 Specification.

cw:spiral.cw:title: ISO-1 for Data Discovery - Conditional
cw:spiral.cw:description: This spiral includes conditional ISO 19115-1 attributes for data discovery. This list of attributes was obtained from table F.1 of the ISO 19115-1 Specification.

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Type
cw:item.cw:description: A resource code identifying the type of resource; e.g. dataset, a collection, an application (See MD_ScopeCode) for which the metadata describes.

cw:spiral.cw:title: ISO-1 for Data Discovery - Optional
cw:spiral.cw:description: This spiral includes optional ISO 19115-1 attributes for data discovery. This list of attributes was obtained from table F.1 of the ISO 19115-1 Specification.

cw:item.cw:name: Spatial Resolution
cw:item.cw:description: The nominal scale and/or spatial resolution of the resource.

cw:item.cw:name: Temporal Extent
cw:item.cw:description: The temporal extent of the resource

cw:item.cw:name: Vertical Extent
cw:item.cw:description: The vertical extent of the resource

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Lineage
cw:item.cw:description: A description of the source(s) and production process(es) used in producing the resource.

cw:item.cw:name: Resource on-line Link
cw:item.cw:description: Online link referencing additional information about the resource.

cw:spiral.cw:title: DIF for Data Discovery - Required
cw:spiral.cw:description: The Directory Interchange Format (DIF) is a NASA metadata format used to create directory entries that describe scientific data sets. The attributes in the spiral below are required by the DIF standard. Additonal documentation is available via the following online references:

cw:item.cw:name: Metadata Standard Citation
cw:item.cw:description: The name of the standard to which the metadata conforms

cw:item.cw:name: Metadata Standard Version
cw:item.cw:description: The name of the standard to which the metadata conforms

cw:spiral.cw:title: DIF for Data Discovery - Highly Recommended
cw:spiral.cw:description: The Directory Interchange Format (DIF) is a NASA metadata format used to create directory entries that describe scientific data sets. The attributes in the spiral below are highly recommended by the DIF standard. Additonal documentation is available via the following online references:

cw:item.cw:name: Paleo-Temporal Coverage
cw:item.cw:description: The temporal extent for paleoclimate or geologic data.

cw:item.cw:name: Quality Statement
cw:item.cw:description: Information about the quality of the data or any quality assurance procedures followed in producing the data.

cw:spiral.cw:title: FGDC for Data Discovery - Mandatory
cw:spiral.cw:description: The FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata includes fields in the Identification Information and Metadata Reference Sections that are mandatory for data discovery. In the graphical representation of the standard, these are yellow fields included in yellow sections.

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Update Frequency
cw:item.cw:description: The frequency with which changes and additions are made to the data set after the initial data set is completed

cw:item.cw:name: Distribution Liability
cw:item.cw:description: Statement of the liability assumed by the distributor.

cw:item.cw:name: Turnaround
cw:item.cw:description: Typical turnaround time for the filling of an order.

cw:spiral.cw:title: FGDC Mandatory if Applicable
cw:spiral.cw:description: The FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata includes many fields related to data understanding. These are generally labeled "Mandatory if Applicable". In the graphical representation of the standard, these are green fields included in yellow or green sections.

cw:item.cw:name: Attribute Accuracy Report
cw:item.cw:description: An explanation of the accuracy of the identification of the entities and assignments of values in the data set and a description of the tests used

cw:item.cw:name: Attribute Accuracy Value
cw:item.cw:description: An estimate of the accuracy of the identification of the entities and assignments of attribute values in the data set

cw:item.cw:name: Attribute Accuracy Explanation
cw:item.cw:description: The identification of the test that yielded the Attribute Accuracy Value.

cw:item.cw:name: Logical Consistency Report
cw:item.cw:description: An explanation of the fidelity of relationships in the data set and tests used.

cw:item.cw:name: Horizontal Positional Accuracy Report
cw:item.cw:description: An explanation of the accuracy of the horizontal coordinate measurements and a description of the tests used.

cw:item.cw:name: Horizontal Positional Accuracy Value
cw:item.cw:description: An estimate of the accuracy of the horizontal coordinate measurements in the data set expressed in (ground) meters.

cw:item.cw:name: Horizontal Positional Accuracy Explanation
cw:item.cw:description: The identification of the test that yielded the Horizontal Positional Accuracy Value.

cw:item.cw:name: Vertical Positional Accuracy Report
cw:item.cw:description: An explanation of the accuracy of the vertical coordinate measurements and a description of the tests used.

cw:item.cw:name: Vertical Positional Accuracy Value
cw:item.cw:description: an estimate of the accuracy of the vertical coordinate measurement in the data set expressed in (ground) meters.

cw:item.cw:name: Vertical Positional Accuracy Explanation
cw:item.cw:description: The identification of the test that yielded the Vertical Positional Accuracy Value.

cw:item.cw:name: Source Time Period
cw:item.cw:description: Time period for which the source data set corresponds to the ground.

cw:item.cw:name: Source Citation Abbreviation
cw:item.cw:description: Short-form alias for the source citation.

cw:item.cw:name: Source Used
cw:item.cw:description: The source used in the processing step.

cw:item.cw:name: Source Produced
cw:item.cw:description: The source produced from the process step.

cw:spiral.cw:title: DCAT for Data Discovery - Mandatory
cw:spiral.cw:description: The Data Catalog Vocabulary (DCAT) is an RDF vocabulary designed to facilitate interoperability between data catalogs published on the Web. This spirals includes the required common core attributes for DCAT.

cw:spiral.cw:title: ECS for Data Discovery - Recommended
cw:spiral.cw:description: This spiral includes the attributes recommended for use with the NASA ECS metadata model. A more detailed descripion of these attributes can be found in the EMD Technical Paper.

cw:item.cw:name: Version Description
cw:item.cw:description: A brief description of the differences between this collection version and another collection version.

cw:item.cw:name: Phone Type
cw:item.cw:description: The type of telephone number being provided (voice, TDD/TTY, faxsimile).

cw:item.cw:name: Sensor Long Name
cw:item.cw:description: The generic or long name description of a sensor (e.g. Visible-Near Infrared, Human Visual, Human Auditory).

cw:item.cw:name: Sensor Short Name
cw:item.cw:description: The sensory sub-component of an instrument.

cw:item.cw:name: Center Latitude
cw:item.cw:description: Geodetic latitude of center of locality.

cw:item.cw:name: Center Longitude
cw:item.cw:description: Longitude of approximate center of locality.

cw:item.cw:name: Radius Units
cw:item.cw:description: The unit of measurement describing the distance from the center of spatial extent or coverage to the furthest point covered by the spatial extent of the locality used to determine a circular region representing general extent or coverage.

cw:item.cw:name: Exclusion GRing Flag
cw:item.cw:description: Flag which determines if the coordinates represent the Outer or Exclusion G-Ring.

cw:item.cw:name: GRing Point Latitude
cw:item.cw:description: The geodetic latitude of a point of the G-ring.

cw:item.cw:name: GRing Point Longitude
cw:item.cw:description: The longitude of a point of the G-Ring.

cw:item.cw:name: GRing Point Sequence Number
cw:item.cw:description: Value denotes the numerical sequence position of a G-Ring point.

cw:item.cw:name: Point Latitude
cw:item.cw:description: A single geodetic latitudinal value.

cw:item.cw:name: Point Longitude
cw:item.cw:description: A single longitudinal value.

cw:item.cw:name: Ends at Present Flag
cw:item.cw:description: Denotes that a data collection which covers, temporally, a discontinuous range, currently ends at the present date.

cw:item.cw:name: Date Type
cw:item.cw:description: Type of date represented by the value in the date attributes of the temporal subclasses.

cw:item.cw:name: Precision of Seconds
cw:item.cw:description: The precision (position in number of places to right of decimal point) of seconds used in measurement.

cw:item.cw:name: Temporal Range Type
cw:item.cw:description: Informs the system and ultimately the end user how the temporal coverage is specified for the collection, granule, or event.

cw:item.cw:name: Time Type
cw:item.cw:description: Provides the time system which the values found in temporal subclasses represent.

cw:spiral.cw:title: ECHO for Data Discovery - Mandatory
cw:spiral.cw:description: This recommendation includes the required fields from Section 4.2 of the ECHO Data Partner's User Guide (Version 10.7).

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Long Name
cw:item.cw:description: The reference name used in describing the scientific contents of the data collection.

cw:spiral.cw:title: ECHO for Data Discovery - Recommended
cw:spiral.cw:description: This recommendation includes the recommended fields from Section 4.2 of the ECHO Data Partner's User Guide (Version 10.7).

cw:item.cw:name: Temporal Keyword
cw:item.cw:description: Keyword identifies a time period related to the resource.

cw:item.cw:name: Sensor Characteristics
cw:item.cw:description: Referential information for the collection source/sensor configuration.

cw:item.cw:name: TwoDCoordinateSystem
cw:item.cw:description: Bounding extent defined in two dimensions with min and max values.

cw:item.cw:name: AssociatedDIFs
cw:item.cw:description: Specifies the Directory Interchange Format (DIF) identifier for the collection.

cw:item.cw:name: Spatial Extent
cw:item.cw:description: The spatial extent of the resource.

cw:item.cw:name: Additional Attributes
cw:item.cw:description: Attributes used to describe unique characteristics of the collection which extend beyond those defined in the model.

cw:spiral.cw:title: ISO-1 for Service Discovery - Mandatory
cw:spiral.cw:description: This spiral includes mandatory ISO 19115-1 attributes for Service discovery. This list of attributes was obtained from table F.2 of the ISO 19115-1 Specification.

cw:spiral.cw:title: ISO-1 for Service Discovery - Conditional
cw:spiral.cw:description: This spiral includes conditional ISO 19115-1 attributes for Service discovery. This list of attributes was obtained from table F.2 of the ISO 19115-1 Specification.

cw:item.cw:name: Coupled Resource
cw:item.cw:description: Identifier and name of the dataset to which the service is coupled.

cw:item.cw:name: Coupled Type
cw:item.cw:description: Describes the tightness of the coupling to the coupled resource.

cw:spiral.cw:title: ISO-1 for Service Discovery - Optional
cw:spiral.cw:description: This spiral includes optional ISO 19115-1 attributes for Service discovery. This list of attributes was obtained from table F.2 of the ISO 19115-1 Specification.

cw:spiral.cw:title: ACDD Variable Attributes for Usability - Highly Recommended
cw:spiral.cw:description: The following NetCDF Attribute Convention for Data Discovery variable attributes are highly recommended for data usability.

cw:item.cw:name: Units
cw:item.cw:description: The units of the variables data values.

cw:item.cw:name: Coverage Content Type
cw:item.cw:description: An ISO 19115-1 code to indicate the source of the data

cw:spiral.cw:title: SERF for Service Discovery - Required
cw:spiral.cw:description: The Service Entry Resource Format (SERF) is the de-facto GCMD standard for describing data services and applications. This spiral includes the fields that are required by the SERF standard. Additonal documentation is available via the following online references:

cw:spiral.cw:title: SERF for Service Discovery - Highly Recommended
cw:spiral.cw:description: The Service Entry Resource Format (SERF) is the de-facto GCMD standard for describing data services and applications. This spiral includes the fields that are highly recommended by the SERF standard. Additonal documentation is available via the following online references:

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Quality Description
cw:item.cw:description: Description of the quality of the resource or any quality assurance procedures followed in producing the resource.
cw:item.cw:note: ISO-1 provides free text fields for describing quality information in the DQ_MeasureReference, DQ_EvaluationMethod, and DQ_DescriptiveResult objects.

cw:item.cw:name: Lineage Scope
cw:item.cw:description: Type of resource and/or extent to which the lineage information applies.

cw:item.cw:name: Process Step
cw:item.cw:description: Information about an event or transformation in the life of a resource including the process used to maintain the resource.

cw:item.cw:name: Process Step Description
cw:item.cw:description: Description of the event, including related parameters or tolerances.

cw:item.cw:name: Process Step Purpose
cw:item.cw:description: Requirement or purpose for the process step.

cw:item.cw:name: Process Step Time
cw:item.cw:description: Date, time, range or period of process step.

cw:item.cw:name: Processor
cw:item.cw:description: Identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organisation(s) associated with the process step.

cw:item.cw:name: Process Step Reference
cw:item.cw:description: Process step documentation.

cw:item.cw:name: Process Step Scope
cw:item.cw:description: Type of resource and/or extent to which the process step applies.

cw:item.cw:name: Source Description
cw:item.cw:description: Detailed description of the source.

cw:item.cw:name: Source Reference System
cw:item.cw:description: Spatial reference system used by the source.

cw:item.cw:name: Source Metadata
cw:item.cw:description: Reference to metadata for the source.

cw:item.cw:name: Source Scope
cw:item.cw:description: Type and/or extent of the source.

cw:item.cw:name: Source Step
cw:item.cw:description: Information about a process step in which this source was used.

cw:item.cw:name: Data Quality Scope
cw:item.cw:description: The specific data to which the data quality information applies.

cw:item.cw:name: Standalone Report Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Reference to external standalone quality report.

cw:item.cw:name: Report
cw:item.cw:description: Quantitative quality information for the data specified by the scope.

cw:item.cw:name: Completeness Report
cw:item.cw:description: Reports on the presence and absence of features, their attributes and relationships.

cw:item.cw:name: Logical Consistency
cw:item.cw:description: The degree of adherence to logical rules of data structure, attribution and relationships (data structure can be conceptual, logical or physical).

cw:item.cw:name: Positional Accuracy Report
cw:item.cw:description: Accuracy of the position of features within a spatial reference system.

cw:item.cw:name: Thematic Accuracy Report
cw:item.cw:description: Accuracy of quantitative attributes and the correctness of non-quantitative attributes and of the classifications of features and their relationships.

cw:item.cw:name: Temporal Quality Report
cw:item.cw:description: Quality of the temporal attributes and temporal relationships of features.

cw:item.cw:name: Usability Report
cw:item.cw:description: Specific quality information about a dataset's suitability for a particular application or conformance to a set of requirements.

cw:item.cw:name: Confidence
cw:item.cw:description: Trustworthiness of a data quality result.

cw:item.cw:name: Representativity
cw:item.cw:description: Degree to which the sample used has produced a result which is representative of the data within the data quality scope.

cw:item.cw:name: Homogeneity
cw:item.cw:description: Expected or tested uniformity of the results obtained for a data quality evaluation.

cw:item.cw:name: Measure
cw:item.cw:description: The type of evaluation

cw:item.cw:name: Measure Identifier
cw:item.cw:description: Identifier of the measure, value uniquely identifying the measure within a namespace.

cw:item.cw:name: Measure Name
cw:item.cw:description: Name of the test applied to the data.

cw:item.cw:name: Measure Description
cw:item.cw:description: Description of the measure.

cw:item.cw:name: Evalulation Method
cw:item.cw:description: The procedure used to evaluate the measure.

cw:item.cw:name: Evalulation Method Type
cw:item.cw:description: Type of method used to evaluate quality of the data.

cw:item.cw:name: Evaluation Method Description
cw:item.cw:description: Description of the evaluation method.

cw:item.cw:name: Evaluation Procedure
cw:item.cw:description: Reference to the procedure information.

cw:item.cw:name: Evaluation Reference
cw:item.cw:description: Information on documents which are referenced in developing and applying a data quality evaluation method.

cw:item.cw:name: Measure Time
cw:item.cw:description: Date or range of dates on which a data quality measure was applied.

cw:item.cw:name: Result
cw:item.cw:description: The output of the evaluation

cw:item.cw:name: Conformance Result
cw:item.cw:description: Information about the outcome of evaluating the obtained value (or set of values) against a specified acceptable conformance quality level.

cw:item.cw:name: Quantitative Result
cw:item.cw:description: The values or information about the value(s) (or set of values) obtained from applying a data quality measure.

cw:item.cw:name: Descriptive Result
cw:item.cw:description: Data quality descriptive result.

cw:item.cw:name: Coverage Result
cw:item.cw:description: Result organising the measured values as a coverage.

cw:spiral.cw:title: WSDL for Web Service Description
cw:spiral.cw:description: Web Service Description Language (WSDL) is a standard format for describing web services. This spiral includes the WSDL attributes recommended for web services description.

cw:item.cw:name: Types
cw:item.cw:description: Describes the data. The XML Schema language (also known as XSD) is used (inline or referenced) for this purpose.

cw:item.cw:name: Interface
cw:item.cw:description: A set of operations supported by one or more service endpoints.

cw:item.cw:name: Binding
cw:item.cw:description: A protocol and data format specification for a particular interface.

cw:item.cw:name: Service
cw:item.cw:description: The end points supported by the web service.

cw:item.cw:name: Parent Metadata Reference
cw:item.cw:description: Identification of the parent metadata record.

cw:item.cw:name: Metadata Profile Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Citation for the profile(s) of the metadata standard to which the metadata conforms.

cw:item.cw:name: Alternate Metadata Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Reference to alternative metadata or metadata in a non-ISO standard for the same resource.

cw:item.cw:name: Additional Resource Documentation
cw:item.cw:description: Other documentation associated with the resource.

cw:item.cw:name: Keyword Vocabulary Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Name of the formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of keywords.

cw:item.cw:name: Keyword Ontology Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Reference that binds the keyword class to a formal conceptualization of a knowledge domain for use in semantic processing.

cw:item.cw:name: Additional Usage Documentation
cw:item.cw:description: Publications that describe usage of data.

cw:item.cw:name: Identified Issues Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Citation of a description of known issues associated with the resource along with proposed solutions if available.

cw:item.cw:name: Related Resource Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Citation information about the associated resource.

cw:item.cw:name: Related Metadata Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Reference to the metadata of the associated resource.

cw:item.cw:name: Constraint Reference
cw:item.cw:description: Citation for the limitation or constraint.

cw:item.cw:name: Additional Lineage Documentation
cw:item.cw:description: Additional descriptive information, such as a publication that describes the process for generating the resource.

cw:item.cw:name: Process Step Reference
cw:item.cw:description: Process step documentation.

cw:item.cw:name: Source Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Reference to the processing input source.

cw:item.cw:name: Parameters Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Reference providing description of the parameters.

cw:item.cw:name: Feature Catalogue Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Information identifying the feature catalogue or the conceptual schema.

cw:item.cw:name: Portrayal Catalogue Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Information identifying the portrayal catalogue used.

cw:item.cw:name: Format Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Citation/URL of the specification for the format.

cw:item.cw:name: Medium Reference
cw:item.cw:description: Name of the medium on which the resource can be stored (resourceFormat) or distributed.

cw:item.cw:name: Application Schema Information
cw:item.cw:description: Name of the application schema used.

cw:item.cw:name: Service Operation Reference
cw:item.cw:description: Provides a reference to the resource on which the service operates.

cw:item.cw:name: Service Profile Reference
cw:item.cw:description: Profile to which the service adheres.

cw:item.cw:name: Service Standard Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Standard to which the service adheres.

cw:item.cw:name: Service Resource Reference
cw:item.cw:description: Reference to the resource on which the service operates.

cw:item.cw:name: Evaluation Reference Document
cw:item.cw:description: Information on documents which are referenced in developing and applying a data quality evaluation method.

cw:item.cw:name: Evaluation Specification
cw:item.cw:description: Citation of data product specification or user requirement against which data is being evaluated.

cw:item.cw:name: Measure Source Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Reference to the source.

cw:item.cw:name: Algorithm Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Information identifying the algorithm and version or date.

cw:item.cw:name: Processing Software Reference
cw:item.cw:description: Reference to document describing processing software.

cw:item.cw:name: Processing Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Reference to documentation describing the processing.

cw:item.cw:name: Operation Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Identification of the mission.

cw:item.cw:name: Plan Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Identification of authority requesting target collection.

cw:item.cw:name: Requirement Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Identification of reference or guidance material for the requirement.

cw:item.cw:name: Specific Usage
cw:item.cw:description: Brief description of the resource and/or resource series usage.

cw:item.cw:name: Usage Time
cw:item.cw:description: Date and time of the first use or range of uses of the resource and/or resource series.

cw:item.cw:name: User Determined Limitations
cw:item.cw:description: Applications, determined by the user for which the resource and/or resource series is not suitable.

cw:item.cw:name: User Contact
cw:item.cw:description: Identification of and means of communicating with person(s) and organisation(s) using the resource(s).

cw:item.cw:name: User Response
cw:item.cw:description: Response to the user-determined limitations.

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Status
cw:item.cw:description: The status of the resource

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Language
cw:item.cw:description: The language of the resource.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Attribute Convention for Data Discovery - Highly Recommended
cw:spiral.cw:description: These attributes are highly recommended by the Attribute Convention for Data Discovery

cw:spiral.cw:title: Attribute Convention for Data Discovery - Recommended
cw:spiral.cw:description: These attributes are recommended by the Attribute Convention for Data Discovery

cw:item.cw:name: Common Data Model Datatype
cw:item.cw:description: The THREDDS data type for this resource.
cw:item.cw:note: Current values: vector, grid, textTable, tin, stereoModel, video.

cw:item.name: Author / Originator World Wide Web Address

cw:item.cw:name: Project Name
cw:item.cw:description: The name of the project that the resource was associated with.

cw:item.cw:name: Processing Level
cw:item.cw:description: A code that indicates the extent of processing done in the creation of a dataset.

cw:item.cw:name: Acknowledgement
cw:item.cw:description: Provides a place to acknowledge various types of support for the project that produced the data.

cw:item.cw:name: Temporal Resolution
cw:item.cw:description: The smallest time step included in the resource.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Attribute Convention for Data Discovery - Suggested
cw:spiral.cw:description: These attributes are suggested by the Attribute Convention for Data Discovery

cw:item.cw:name: Contributor Role
cw:item.cw:description: The role of any individuals or institutions that contributed to the creation of the data.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Acquisition
cw:spiral.cw:description: The Acquisition Information Spiral provides information about instruments used to make observations and platforms that they are mounted on.

cw:item.cw:name: Platform
cw:item.cw:description: The platform used to collect the observations.

cw:item.cw:name: Instrument
cw:item.cw:description: Information about the instrument used to make the observations.

cw:item.cw:name: Instrument Keyword
cw:item.cw:description: Keywords that describe the instrument used to collect the resource.

cw:item.cw:name: Instrument Keyword Vocabulary
cw:item.cw:description: The name of a registered authoritative source for instrument keywords.
cw:item.cw:path: if (/database/table_data[@name="instrument"]/row/field[@name="gcmd_name"] !=false) then (Global Change Master Directory Instrument Keywords) else null
cw:item.cw:note: DIF and ECHO require that theme keywords come from the Global Change Master Directory list.

cw:item.cw:name: Platform Keyword
cw:item.cw:description: Keywords that describe the platform used to collect the resource.

cw:item.cw:name: Platform Keyword Vocabulary
cw:item.cw:description: The name of a registered authoritative source for platform keywords.
cw:item.cw:path: if (/database/table_data[@name="platform"]/row/field[@name="gcmd_name"] !=false) then (Global Change Master Directory Platform Keywords) else null
cw:item.cw:note: DIF and ECHO require that theme keywords come from the Global Change Master Directory list.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Acquisition Details
cw:spiral.cw:description: Details about the platforms, instruments, nand sensors used to collect the data

cw:item.cw:name: Platform Short Name
cw:item.cw:description: The platform used to collect the observations.

cw:item.cw:name: Platform Long Name
cw:item.cw:description: The expanded or long name of the platform associated with an instrument.

cw:item.cw:name: Platform UUID
cw:item.cw:description: Unique identifier for the platform.

cw:item.cw:name: Platform Type
cw:item.cw:description: The most relevant platform type.

cw:item.cw:name: Platform Citation
cw:item.cw:description: Source where information../collections/LARC/ECHO10/XML/MB2LME.xml about the platform is described.

cw:item.cw:name: Platform Sponsor
cw:item.cw:description: Organization responsible for building, launch, or operation of the platform.

cw:item.cw:name: Platform Description
cw:item.cw:description: Narrative description of the platform supporting the instrument.

cw:item.cw:name: Platform Characteristic
cw:item.cw:description: Description of the Platform Characteristic attribute.

cw:item.cw:name: Platform Characteristic Data Type
cw:item.cw:description: The datatype of the Platform Characteristic/attribute.

cw:item.cw:name: Platform Characteristic Description
cw:item.cw:description: Description of the Platform Characteristic attribute.

cw:item.cw:name: Platform Characteristic Name
cw:item.cw:description: The name of the Platform Characteristic attribute.

cw:item.cw:name: Platform Characteristic Unit
cw:item.cw:description: Units associated with the Platform Characteristic attribute value.

cw:item.cw:name: Platform Characteristic Value
cw:item.cw:description: The value of the Platform Characteristic attribute.

cw:item.cw:name: Instrument Short Name
cw:item.cw:description: Short name (abbreviation) for the Instrument used to collect the observations.

cw:item.cw:name: Instrument Long Name
cw:item.cw:description: Full name (unabbreviated) for the Instrument used to collect the observations.

cw:item.cw:name: Instrument UUID
cw:item.cw:description: Unique Identifier for the instrument.

cw:item.cw:name: Instrument Type
cw:item.cw:description: The type of instrument.

cw:item.cw:name: Instrument Citation
cw:item.cw:description: A citation to reference material that provides details about the instrument.

cw:item.cw:name: Instrument Description
cw:item.cw:description: Textual description of the instrument.

cw:item.cw:name: Instrument Characteristic
cw:item.cw:description: Description of the Instrument Characteristic attribute.

cw:item.cw:name: Instrument Characteristic Data Type
cw:item.cw:description: The datatype of the Instrument Characteristic/attribute.

cw:item.cw:name: Instrument Characteristic Description
cw:item.cw:description: Description of the Instrument Characteristic attribute.

cw:item.cw:name: Instrument Characteristic Name
cw:item.cw:description: The name of the Instrument Characteristic attribute.

cw:item.cw:name: Instrument Characteristic Unit
cw:item.cw:description: Units associated with the Instrument Characteristic attribute value.

cw:item.cw:name: Instrument Characteristic Value
cw:item.cw:description: The value of the Platform Characteristic attribute.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Project Identification
cw:spiral.cw:description: Identifying projects unambiguously requires titles and identifiers.

cw:item.cw:name: Project Sponsor
cw:item.cw:description: The organization responsible for funding the project.

cw:item.cw:name: Sponsor Project Identifier
cw:item.cw:description: An identifier for the project used by the organization responsible for funding the project.

cw:item.cw:name: Project Host
cw:item.cw:description: The organization responsible for hosting a project website or including it in a portal.

cw:item.cw:name: Host Project Identifier
cw:item.cw:description: An identifier for the project used by the organization responsible for hosting a project website or including it in a portal.

cw:item.cw:name: Project Keyword
cw:item.cw:description: Keywords that describe the Project used to collect the resource.

cw:item.cw:name: Project Contact
cw:item.cw:description: The project point of contact.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Project Description
cw:spiral.cw:description: Descriptive information supports full-text and facet searches

cw:spiral.cw:title: Project Extent
cw:spiral.cw:description: Describing the temporal and spatial extent of a project is critical for logistics and planning.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Project Links
cw:spiral.cw:description: Web resources of various kinds that are related to projects provide important information that supplements the standard and structured information included in the metadata.

cw:item.cw:name: Award Link
cw:item.cw:description: A link to information about the award that provided support for the project.

cw:item.cw:name: Data Link
cw:item.cw:description: A link to data produced by the project.

cw:item.cw:name: Product Link
cw:item.cw:description: A link to a product produced by the project.

cw:item.cw:name: Project Website Link
cw:item.cw:description: A link to a website with information about the project.

cw:item.cw:name: Resource Identifier Description
cw:item.cw:description: Description for the resource identifier.

cw:item.cw:name: Processing Level Description
cw:item.cw:description: Description of the processing level.

cw:item.cw:name: Number of Sensors
cw:item.cw:description: Number of sensors used on the instrument when acquire the granule data.

cw:item.cw:name: Operation Modes
cw:item.cw:description: The operation mode applied on the instrument when acquire the granule data.

cw:item.cw:name: Operation
cw:item.cw:description: Operation Identifier

cw:item.cw:name: Operation Description
cw:item.cw:description: Description of the operation

cw:item.cw:name: Ancillary Keyword
cw:item.cw:description: This field allows authors to provide any words or phrases needed to further describe the data set.

cw:item.cw:name: Grid Dimension Count
cw:item.cw:description: Number of independent spatial-temporal axes.

cw:item.cw:name: Grid Dimension Type Code
cw:item.cw:description: Name of the dimension type axis.

cw:item.cw:name: Grid Dimension Resolution
cw:item.cw:description: Degree of detail in the grid dataset.

cw:item.cw:name: Sensor Technique
cw:item.cw:description: Technique applied for this instrument in the configuration.

cw:spiral.cw:title: DataCite Metadata Schema for the Publication and Citation of Research Data - Mandatory
cw:spiral.cw:description: The DataCite Metadata Schema is a list of core metadata properties chosen for the accurate and consistent identification of a resource for citation and retrieval purposes, along with recommended use instructions. The resource that is being identified can be of any kind, but it is typically a dataset. We use the term 'dataset' in its broadest sense. We mean it to include not only numerical data, but any other research data outputs.

cw:spiral.cw:title: DataCite Metadata Schema for the Publication and Citation of Research Data - Recommended
cw:spiral.cw:description: The DataCite Metadata Schema is a list of core metadata properties chosen for the accurate and consistent identification of a resource for citation and retrieval purposes, along with recommended use instructions. The resource that is being identified can be of any kind, but it is typically a dataset. We use the term 'dataset' in its broadest sense. We mean it to include not only numerical data, but any other research data outputs.

cw:spiral.cw:title: DataCite Metadata Schema for the Publication and Citation of Research Data - Optional
cw:spiral.cw:description: The DataCite Metadata Schema is a list of core metadata properties chosen for the accurate and consistent identification of a resource for citation and retrieval purposes, along with recommended use instructions. The resource that is being identified can be of any kind, but it is typically a dataset. We use the term 'dataset' in its broadest sense. We mean it to include not only numerical data, but any other research data outputs.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Dataset Descriptions: HCLS Community Profile - Summary - Required
cw:spiral.cw:description: Concepts that MUST occur at the Summary Level.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Dataset Descriptions: HCLS Community Profile - Version - Required
cw:spiral.cw:description: Concepts that MUST occur at the Version Level.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Dataset Descriptions: HCLS Community Profile - Distribution - Required
cw:spiral.cw:description: Concepts that MUST occur at the Distribution Level.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Dataset Descriptions: HCLS Community Profile - Summary - Suggested
cw:spiral.cw:description: Concepts that SHOULD occur at the Summary Level.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Dataset Descriptions: HCLS Community Profile - Version - Suggested
cw:spiral.cw:description: Concepts that SHOULD occur at the Version Level.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Dataset Descriptions: HCLS Community Profile - Distribution - Suggested
cw:spiral.cw:description: Concepts that SHOULD occur at the Distribution Level.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Dataset Descriptions: HCLS Community Profile - Summary - Optional
cw:spiral.cw:description: Concepts that MAY occur at the Summary Level.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Dataset Descriptions: HCLS Community Profile - Version - Optional
cw:spiral.cw:description: Concepts that MAY occur at the Version Level.

cw:spiral.cw:title: Dataset Descriptions: HCLS Community Profile - Distribution - Optional
cw:spiral.cw:description: Concepts that MAY occur at the Distribution Level.
